item.title: Variadic Function With Empty Interface
item.description:
This topic include lots of points, let’s get it step by step:

  • first

A variadic function is generally looked like this: func(t ...type){/*...*/}. The ellipsis “…” in the declaration means that the function can be called with any number of arguments of the type.
